result.arabic_text: لَكُمۡ فِيهَا مَنَٰفِعُ إِلَىٰٓ أَجَلٖ مُّسَمّٗى ثُمَّ مَحِلُّهَآ إِلَى ٱلۡبَيۡتِ ٱلۡعَتِيقِ
result.translation: 33. Ama cajjih masgaadah bahtan lacat kaxxa tuxxiq liton kaa asguude kalah muggaqsime waktî fanah, tohuk lakal masgaadah arac kaak yookomeeh Raage qarih xaqu kinni (makki caram kinnuk).
